titleStmt.title: SII 8.148: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 148. (A.R. No. 557 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti .
tiripuvaṉaviratevaṟku yāṇṭu 3 10 5vatu Āṟakaḷuruṭaiya Irācarācatevaṉ poṉparappiṉāṉāṉa vāṇakovaraiyaṉen
mituṉanāyaṟṟu Eṭṭān tiyatiyum Aṉuḻamum peṟṟa tirunāyaṟṟukkiḻamai nāḷ Uṭaiyār tiruvaṇṇāmalaiU
ṭaiya ṉāyaṉārai vantu kumpiṭṭu Iṟṟaiṉāḷile tirukkoyil poṉmeyntu Innāyaṉārkkut tirumaṭai
ppaḷḷippuṟamākavum pūcaiyun tiruppaṇikku muṭalākavun tevatāṉamāka viṭṭa peṇṇai vaṭakaraic ceṅkuṉṟa
ṉāṭṭu māttūrāṉa Irācarācanallūrum vāṇakappāṭi Āṭaiyūrnāṭṭu meyūrāṉa poṉparappiṉanallūrum jayaṅ
koṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattup palkuṉṟakkoṭṭattup paṅkaḷa nāṭṭut teṟkuvakai ceñlūrnāṭṭu Aṭṭaiyamaṅka
lamāṉa puṇṇiyavāṭiyanallūrum Āka Immuṉṟūrum Ental pāntaluṭpaṭa nāṟpāṟ kellaikkuḷpaṭṭa naṉ
cai puṉcai nilamum meṉokkiṉa maramuṅ kiḻnokkiṉa kiṇaṟu muṭpaṭa tevatāṉamāka viṭṭeṉ . Ivvūrkaḷā
l vanta Āyam pāṭikāval taṟiyiṟai taṭṭārppāṭṭaṅ kuṟṟatteṇṭam paṭṭitteṇṭam ĀḷaAḷamañ
ciyum Innāyaṉār tevatāṉaṅkaḷilun tiruvaṇṇāmalaiyilu tirukkoyililum cipiṭavāriyilum ma
ṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭa pallāyaṅkaḷiluṅ kaḻañcu poṉ talaiyāka vorumāp pon kaṭaiyākavum Oru
kācu talaiyāka Oru ciṉṉaṅ kaṭaiyākavum nāḻi nellu talaiyāka Uriynelluk kaṭaiyākavum Āḷa
mañciyu muṭpaṭak koḻvāṉ civatturoyiyumāyk komāṅsattai tiṉṟāṉumāy movāy pukku mu
laiyeḻuntāṉumāy Oruvaṉukku moruttikkum piṟavātāṉumāyk keṅkaiyiṭai kumariyiṭai
kurāl pacuk koṉṟāṉ ceyta pāvaṅ koḻvāṉ . Itu paṉmāheśvara rakṣai ....
Digital edition of SII 8.148 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
